last_episode_to_air.overview: An inmate accused of murder makes a daring escape attempt from the courthouse; the judge has harsh words for a woman who pretended to have cancer as part of a fundraising scam; a man found guilty of DWI shows up 18 minutes late for his sentencing and then interrupts the hearing when his mobile phone rings; and more.

name: Court Cam

The judge chastises a defendant for his courtroom outburst. A convicted murderer's mother tells the court that she used methamphetamine with him the day he shot his boss. A defendant threatens to sue the judge after he didn't rule in his favor during a civil hearing; and more.

A maskless defendant tells the judge he's tested positive for tuberculosis; a grieving son forgives the woman responsible for his parents' deaths; the judge orders a convicted murderer removed from the courtroom for smiling during a Victim Impact Statement; and more.

A grieving mother confronts the family of her son's killer; a woman is sentenced for eating donuts without paying for them; a convicted murderer is verbally confronted in court by his victim's family; and more.

Two disgraced fishing champions apologize for cheating; grieving parents confront the former police officer who killed their son; a man suspected of driving with a suspended license appears in virtual court from a car; and more.

The brothers of a woman murdered by her daughter confront the defendant (their niece) in court; an annoyed defendant walks out of a virtual hearing; a man convicted of manslaughter refuses to look at the grieving grandmother of his victim; and more.

The mother of a man on trial for murder gets caught for taking a picture of the jury; a defendant is held in contempt of court after flipping off the judge, twice; a judge chastises a disgraced estate attorney and more.

The mother of a murdered councilwoman throws a bottle at her daughter's accused killer; a defendant attempts to flirt with the judge but still has his bond revoked; the father of a murdered woman forgives her killer...his son-in-law; and more.

The judge gives a 79-year-old woman final warning...stop feeding feral cats or go to jail; a local attorney makes a scene outside the courthouse; a defendant angers the judge by appearing for virtual court wearing facial cream; and more.

A murder victim's family member attacks the defendant in the courtroom; a man angers the judge by smoking a cigarette during his virtual hearing; a juvenile defendant's mom is told to leave the courtroom after complaining about her son's lawyer; and more.

A convicted cop killer goes on a f-bomb tirade in court; a defendant reveals his fandom for the judge before that same judge admonishes him for bad behavior in virtual court; the family of a murder victim lashes out at the killer...a family friend; and more.

A pregnant tenant in a dispute with her landlord appears for her virtual hearing from a hospital delivery room; a courtroom brawl breaks out between the families of a convicted murderer and his victim; a defendant annoys the judge by appearing for virtual court shirtless and smoking a cigarette; and more.

The courtroom erupts into chaos during a hearing for a murder case; the judge chastises a defendant for "making horrible decisions"; a prosecutor strongly disagrees with what he feels is an unreasonable sentence from the judge; and more.

A defendant who curses and flips his middle finger at the judge is held in contempt during a virtual hearing; an attorney who specializes in sexual battery cases pleads not guilty to sexual battery; a police officer forgives the man who plead guilty to firing shots at him after robbing a coffee shop; and more.

The judge moves a probation review to her courtroom after the defendant appears drunk for his virtual hearing; a defendant gets thrown out of the courtroom after talking back to the judge; a man accused of driving while intoxicated cries over his bail fees; and more.

A man convicted of double murder elbows his own attorney in the face; a defendant misses his virtual hearing by falling asleep; the judge loses his patience during a tenant/landlord dispute; and more.

A man convicted of murdering his 5-year-old son makes a scene in the courtroom; a convicted killer won't stay in his seat during his virtual sentencing; a man in court for allegedly violating his parole is held without bond after his parole officer accuses him of making threats; and more.

A judge gets creative for the sentencing of a woman who threw her food at a restaurant employee; a teacher accused of being drunk at school is arrested for public intoxication at her plea hearing; an accused stalker screams and swears after the judge announces her bond; and more.
Chaos erupts as a defendant attacks the bailiff; a convicted murderer calls the detectives in his case idiots; a defendant keeps firing his court appointed lawyers; and more.

A murder victim's sister tears into the killer in court; a man facing drug charges shows up for his virtual arraignment without his pants; a grieving mother defends the woman responsible for her son's accidental death...her own sister; and more.

A man being sentenced to prison leaps over the bench and attacks the 62-year-old judge; a defendant lands in hot water after accidentally uttering a foul-mouth insult before disconnecting from his virtual hearing; a man charged with domestic violence flips off the judge; and more.

A grieving father jeers his son's killer after sentencing; a defendant gets into a screaming match with the judge during her virtual hearing; an assault victim bravely faces her attacker in court; and more.

A woman accused of driving with a suspended license yells expletives at the judge; a grieving mother screams at her daughter's killer; a judge gets tough while sentencing a young father for aggravated robbery; and more.

A man accused of driving with a suspended license gets caught lying to the judge about why he was late for court; the grieving partner of a drunk driving victim gets tasered outside the courthouse; a man testifies that his son wasn't assaulting him, claiming they were having a "cuddle match"; and more.

A grieving father is removed from the courtroom for cursing at his daughter's killer; a man accused of violating his parole by drinking alcohol claims he absorbed it from aftershave lotion; a defendant breaks down crying when the judge denies her bond; and more.

A woman who's just undergone transition surgery is suing her ex-boyfriend for throwing her testicles in the trash; a college student who fundraised almost $40,000 by falsely claiming to have pancreatic cancer apologizes to the court; a man accused of assault repeatedly angers the judge during his pretrial hearing; and more.

The judge loses his patience with a man accused of drunk boating; a defendant waiting outside the courtroom is physically assaulted; a woman being sued for back rent screams at the judge during her virtual hearing; and more.

A man named Edward Cocaine appears in court for unlawful possession of Xanax; two sisters confront the man who killed their little brother; the judge admonishes a model accused of assaulting a 16-year-old boy she says was bullying her son; and more.

A man accused of murder tries to attend his arraignment naked; a woman accused of assaulting her mother hangs up on her virtual hearing; a man seeking a protection order against his wife gives a judge the finger in court; and more.

A convicted murderer has a violent reaction as courtroom deputies take him into custody; a judge refuses to give in to the pleas for mercy from a repeat drug offender; a woman found guilty of probation violation escapes the courtroom before being taken into custody; and more.

A violent convict attacks a fellow inmate in the courtroom; a victim's family member jeers their father's killer as he's taken into custody; a convicted felon is sent back to his cell after using obscene language during his arraignment; and more.

A man whose bond has just been raised to $20,000 attempts a daring escape from the courthouse; a defendant about to be sentenced for drunk driving reports to court...drunk; a man checks in for his virtual plea hearing from an airplane; and more.

A courtroom brawl breaks out after the defendant attacks a court clerk; the judge chastises the grandfather of a defendant for annoying his courtroom staff; a defendant is caught breaking a no-contact order while still in court; and more.

A man charged with Driving with a Suspended License appears at his virtual hearing...driving a car; the judge comes down hard on a man accused of assaulting his baby's mother; a man accused of living on someone else's land stands defiant against the court; and more.

A grieving son shoots his father's accused murderer in the courtroom; a defendant takes out her frustrations on a jailhouse computer; a woman is sent to jail for trying to lie her way out of jury duty; and more.

The judge is not happy with a defendant's casual courtroom attire; a courtroom melee erupts during the sentencing phase of a murder trial, the judge chastises a defendant for violating her bond; and more.

A grieving father speaks out during a sentencing hearing; a judge has mercy on a defendant who violated their probation 17 days before it was due to end; a misinformed judge hugs a defendant he had harsh words for earlier in a hearing; and more.

A woman convicted of assault flees the courtroom after being sentenced to jail time; a grieving man confronts the convict who killed his son in prison; the judge is hard on a carnival worker who's behind on her child support payments; and more.

The judge has harsh words for a man arrested for throwing his iguana at a restaurant manager; a man accused of domestic violence is thrown in jail after violating a no contact order by showing up to court with his alleged victim; and more.

The judge charges a defendant with six counts of contempt after he drops six f-bombs in court; a woman accused of Domestic Assault is unhappy that the conditions of her bond prevent her from following a Taylor Swift tour in Europe; an angry judge yells at a repeat drug offender; and more.

Emotions run high as a grieving daughter confronts her father's killer in court; the judge questions a woman accused of falsely reporting her boyfriend for domestic battery; a judge catches a defendant lying in court and sends her to jail; and more.

A convicted cop killer tells the court that he deserves the death penalty; a judge dismisses the jury after a witness's testimony becomes too emotional; a man charged with D-W-I gets caught lying to the judge; and more.

The judge has harsh words for a man convicted of killing his mother and her boyfriend; a woman charged with Assault and Battery takes out her frustrations on a jailhouse podium; the judge must mute a defendant who won't stop interrupting him in court; and more.

An inmate accused of murder makes a daring escape attempt from the courthouse; the judge has harsh words for a woman who pretended to have cancer as part of a fundraising scam; a man found guilty of DWI shows up 18 minutes late for his sentencing and then interrupts the hearing when his mobile phone rings; and more.

A defendant's desperate escape attempt is thwarted by two jurors who chase him down outside the courthouse; a member of the gallery screams at his brother who's accused of murdering their mother; an angry judge holds a defendant in contempt for interrupting him; and more.

A judge gets temporarily suspended after making a teenager wear handcuffs and prison garb after falling asleep in court; a man arrested for stalking hurls insults at the prosecutor; a defendant objects to his bond conditions...especially the prohibition of beer; and more.

A man accused of indecent exposure slams his head against a courtroom desk during questioning, a father takes his 19-year-old daughter to court over back rent; a woman in court for a bond violation irritates the judge by showing up late for her hearing; and more.

A man convicted of murder gets into a shouting match with the victim's mother; the judge holds a defendant in contempt 3 times after he yells at her during an online hearing; a mother seated in the gallery speaks up in defense of her embarrassed daughter; and more.
